newsitem.title: USA: National Auto to finance Team Car buyers.
newsitem.headline: National Auto to finance Team Car buyers.

text.p: National Auto Finance Co Inc said Tuesday it has agreed to provide non-prime consumer financing for used cars at Team Car Sales, a division of Team Rental Group Inc the company that recently purchased Budget Rent-A-Car Corp.
Team Car Sales sells used cars at eight facilities around the country.
National Auto is a specialized consumer finance company engaged in the purchase, securitization and servicing of car loans originated by dealers for non-prime consumers.

National Auto also said that it has expanded its ongoing relationship with the sales finance group of First Union Corp. The expansion adds more than 1,500 additional automotive dealers in the northeastern United States to the alliance.
